data.name: Herbert's Bakery
data.description:
"Herbert's Bakery have been supplying Bristol's finest shops, restaurants and cafe bars for over forty years.  Just as our now famous 'Street Art' mural brings together fine art with graffitti art, so we at Herbert's Bakery bring together tradional hand crafted techniques with the best  equipment modern technology can offer.

We use the finest and purest ingredients available - unbleached flour with no added gluten to name but one - highly trained and skilled bakers, and the most precious ingredient of all - time." - http://www.herbertsbakery.co.uk/home.php

data.name: Poco Bristol
data.description: "The food and vibe of Poco is punchy and rustic. Poco Bristol is a culmination of our world food travel experiences, rolled into one of the most civilised eating and drinking traditions of the world, ‘tapas’!".."We offer a fast NY style brunch menu, A snappy lunch menu of vibrant super-food salads wraps and sourdough sarnies with grilled fish and organic meats. Then in the evenings, we kick back and roll out a fresh seasonal selection of tapas served with local wines and far-out cocktails." - http://www.tomsfeast.com/restaurants/poco-bristol/

data.name: S S A Wholesale Cash & Carry
The Burger Joint
data.description:
the burger joint is an independently owned licensed restaurant specialising in hand-made luxury burgers. We provide an outstanding dining experience for an outstanding price and, in so doing, prove that burgers don’t have to be the cheap and nasty product that they’ve become in the hands of some of the big chains.

Dan Bekhradnia, the owner, is a University of Bristol graduate and former head chef of the Blue Monkey in Bristol and the Jericho Café in Oxford.  He developed the burger joint concept while training at Joe’s – one of Oxford’s most popular Bistro restaurants. There he observed that their luxury prime beef burger was the single most popular item on the menu. Clearly there is a demand for high quality burgers made with high quality ingredients.

Burgers don’t have to be fast food. In fact, the way we prepare them they are anything but fast. A burger made from top-quality products, and then prepared and cooked with care can be a top-class eating experience. That’s what you’ll get at the burger joint. Whether you dine in our licensed restaurant, or take your food away. We care about quality food.
